author: ate
msg: If the .m2/settings.xml defines a custom </localRepository> location, executing jetspeed-mvn for a custom pom *and* a custom jetspeed-mvn-settings.xml,
the custom jetspeed-mvn-settings.xml also needs to be configured using that same </localRepository>, otherwise locally installled artifacts might not be resolved.
As this is quit a common case but easily forgotten, the currently defined localRepository path is now automatically passed onto the spawned maven execution for a custom pom as well.

author: myrnavl
msg: DERBY-3831; junit.RuntimeStatisticsParser doesn't fully distinguish names of table or index.

author: janb
msg: Add beginnings of security checking; add StreamObserver.setLength()
